game.name: Girl Adventurer
game.description:
Have you played Mario or any similar games in the past? If yes, you are pretty aware of the fun and thrill they offer to the users. In case if you are the new one to this segment, you should join Girl Adventure to know the amount of entertainment these types of adventure challenges provide. In this brand new adventure challenge, you would have to control a girl who wants to go on a journey that is full of treasures and obstacles.  

This brave and courageous girl wants to go on an adventure that includes lots of challenges and obstacles. Join the lady to help her avoid the obstacles and complete her journey in each level! Do not forget to grab the coins to boost your score in the end. There are many hindrances like moving bad creatures or some objects lying on her way. It is up to you to keep her away from all the obstacles that can decrease her power!

On the top left corner of the screen, you can track how many coins you have collected as of now. Check out the status of the present level that is available next to the coin status. You can learn about your health status by looking at the bottom of the screen. Move your character by using arrow keys or clicking the arrow key icons shown on the screen in this html5 jumping game! All the best to guide him against the deadly monsters and cover the long distance to become the most successful adventurer! Check out more platformer games for boys that are free to online, no download required!
